name: carrefour-mobile-automation
description: Desafio de Automação de Testes Mobile (Carrefour)

scripts.test:android: rm -rf reports/allure-results reports/allure-report; AVD_NAME=Medium_Phone_API_36.1 wdio run wdio.android.conf.js --spec; npx allure generate reports/allure-results --clean -o reports/allure-report
scripts.test:ios: rm -rf reports/allure-results reports/allure-report; wdio run ./wdio.ios.conf.js --spec; npx allure generate reports/allure-results --clean -o reports/allure-report

author: Anderson Patricio
